integration_patterns: Data pipeline using AWS Step Functions

evidence.claim: Cubhub utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless compute instances.
The company integrates health records through FHIR APIs, ensuring compliance with healthcare standards.
Cubhub supports X12 transactions for healthcare billing and insurance claims.

icp.icp_reason: Cubhub utilizes X12 EDI transactions, indicating relevance for API-first healthcare data exchange.
